subject: RE: [junit] ordering of testCases.
msgSnippet: Use the junit-addons http://junit-addons.sourceforge.net/junitx/framework/OrderedTestSuite.html ... From: Ashutosh Sharma [mailto:ashutosh.sharma@oracle.com]
messageBody:
Use the junit-addons

http://junit-addons.sourceforge.net/junitx/framework/OrderedTestSuite.html

-----Original Message-----
From: Ashutosh Sharma [mailto:ashutosh.sharma@...]
Sent: Friday, January 23, 2004 3:00 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] ordering of testCases.


Hi all,
Is there anyway where we can gurantee the ordering of the testCases to
be executed.
I mean to say that test1() executes b4 test2()?
